dublin_core.dcvalue: Due to the ubiquitous use of cellular phones much has been speculated on secondary effects of electromagnetic irradiation emitted by those Additionally several studies have reported vegetative alterations as well as effects on the neuronal and molecular levels in humans Here using a psycho physiological test paradigm we examined effects of exposure to pulsed electromagnetic fields on cognitive performance
Effects of pulsed electromagnetic fields on cognitive processes - a pilot study on pulsed field interference with cognitive regeneration.
